document_data.mainbody:
Dragoncall was a spell that was used by dragons. 
This spell was used by dragons to both communicate and compel a nearby sentient creature to hurry to the casting dragons location. The creature rushed to the location as fast and as safely as possible&mdashthe spell could not force a creature to harm itself unnecessarily. Dragoncall could only be cast by dragons.
This spell required only a verbal component.
